title: Getting this Icon is a testament to how often people actually report me.
body:
I've never had so much as a chat restriction. Worst thing I've ever had is a leaver penalty for AFKing in Champ select, then missing the Accept/Decline after someone dodges the lobby I was in.

Either people don't report me, or my idea of bad behaviour is very warped.

replies.body: I didn't get the icon as I'm toxic as shit.
I got it too! Good job friend.
